name: Robot Run (pedroaurelio_n)
description:
Robot Run is a 2D sidescroller runner game for web applications and android devices where you control a robot character that needs to escape from a facility filled with zombies. The player must jump to avoid obstacles and shoot to defeat zombies and gain score. The game level is composed by chunks that are chosen randomly during gameplay.

Main gameplay was originally made in 7 days as an coding test for a Unity Developer job. 

Art from Game Art 2D
Audio from Kenney

GitHub repo
